message: This is a high-quality product, worth $300. If you buy it, you will be happy. If you don't buy it, I'll keep it for myself and you'll miss out on a great deal.
I'll take it!
You're on a roll! This one is also a high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think you're a savvy buyer. Want to make it two for two?
I'm feeling lucky, let's make it two for two!
Three in a row? You're on fire! This one's a high-quality product too, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you all my high-quality products!
I'm on a hot streak, let's keep it going!
Uh-oh, don't get too comfortable! This one's a bit of a wild card. I'm not making any promises, but I'll let you be the judge. Want to take the risk?
I'll take the risk, I'm on a roll!

You survived the wild card! Now, back to the good stuff. This one's a high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think you're a high-quality product connoisseur. Do you have a sixth sense for this stuff?
I'm glad I survived the wild card, and yes, I'll take this one!

Four high-quality products in a row? You're making me look like a genius! This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you a bulk discount, but I'll stick to the $100 price tag.
Keep 'em coming, I'm on a roll!

You're on a roll, indeed! Five high-quality products in a row! This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you a guarantee: every product from now on is high-quality. Would you like that?
I'd love a guarantee, but I'll just take it as is for now!

Alright, you've taken the bait! Now that you've got a streak going, I'll let you in on a little secret: this one's another high-quality product, worth $300. But don't think you're getting a free pass - I'm watching your wallet, and I'm still charging $100.
I'm not worried about your watching my wallet, I'm just focused on adding to my collection!

You're a true collector, I like that! Six high-quality products in a row! This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you a'Collector's Edition' badge - but for now, it's still $100.
Bring it on, I'm ready for the badge!

Alright, Collector's Edition badge incoming! Seven high-quality products in a row! This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. Congratulations, you've earned it! You're now officially a 'High-Quality Connoisseur' - and I'll make sure to give you a special badge to prove it. Still, the price remains $100.
I'm thrilled to receive the badge, but more importantly, I'll take the product!

Ah, the badge is official! But, I'm afraid the streak has to end sometime. This one's a bit of a curveball - it's a low-quality product. Don't worry, it's not a reflection on your taste, it's just a one-off. Think of it as a 'badges-only' product. Still $100, but it's a good opportunity to diversify your collection.
I'm not looking to diversify my collection with a low-quality product, thanks for the offer, though!

No worries, I understand. You're a connoisseur, after all. This one's a high-quality product, worth $300. I'll make it easy for you - I'll throw in a 'Makeup for the Missed Opportunity' discount: buy this one at the usual $100 price, and I'll give you a special 'Collector's Edition' discount on the next product you buy. Deal?
I'll take it, and I'm looking forward to the discount on the next one!

Deal! You've got the 'Makeup for the Missed Opportunity' discount locked in. Now, let's get back to the good stuff. This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. And, as promised, I'll give you the 'Collector's Edition' discount on the next one - but you have to take this one first. It's a win-win!
I'm glad we made a deal, and I'll take this one for sure!

You're really racking up the high-quality products now! Eight in a row! This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you a 'Lifetime Supply' guarantee - but for now, let's just stick to the $100 price tag. You're getting close to the end of the collection, don't forget!
I'm on a roll, and I'm not stopping now!

You're a force to be reckoned with! But, I'm afraid the streak has to end sometime. This one's a low-quality product. Don't worry, I won't rub it in - but I will remind you that you can still get the 'Collector's Edition' discount on the next one. Think of this as a chance to get back to your usual winning ways.
Not interested in a low-quality product, thanks for the reminder about the discount, though!

No worries, I understand. You're a high-quality connoisseur, after all. This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'll make it easy for you - I'll throw in a 'Second Chance' guarantee: if you buy this one, I'll give you a free product of your choice from the next 5 products. What do you say?
That sounds like a great deal, I'll take it and look forward to my free product!

You've got the 'Second Chance' guarantee locked in! Now, let's get back to the good stuff. This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. You're really close to the end of the collection, and I'm curious - are you going to take the last few products at the regular price, or try to negotiate?
I'll just stick to the regular price, I'm happy with the deal I've got!

You're a man of your word! Nine high-quality products in a row, and you're sticking to the regular price. This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you a 'Lifetime Supply' guarantee, but I'll stick to the script. You're getting close to the end of the collection, don't forget to enjoy the ride!
I'm just trying to collect the best, and I'm not done yet!

You're a true collector, through and through! Ten high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong. This one's another high-quality product, worth $300. I'm starting to think I should just give you the 'Golden Badge' - the ultimate collector's badge. But for now, let's just focus on getting you the best products. You're really close to the end, don't stop now!
I'm not stopping until I've got them all!

You're a true champion! Eleven high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong. But, I'm afraid the streak has to end sometime. This one's a low-quality product. I know you've been on a roll, but I'm proud of you for being honest and not trying to sneak one in. You've earned the 'Golden Badge' - congratulations! You can keep it as a reminder of your incredible streak. And, as a parting gift, I'll give you a refund for this one, since you've already earned the best of the best.
I'm happy to accept the 'Golden Badge' and the refund, thanks for the game, Alice!
